title: These Kids' Portraits Of The Trump Administration Should Hang In A Gallery
content:
Kids draw the funniest things.
Jimmy Fallon shared a bunch of children’s amusing depictions of members of President Donald Trump’s administration on Wednesday’s broadcast of “The Tonight Show.”
Jim Carrey best watch out, as they could be after his satirical artwork crown. 
Check out the clip above.
tags: fallon administration things gallery kids bunch hang draw amusing trump jimmy funniest children shared portraits
